channel.title: Update server?
channel.description: when i have an update 4 my server and people are online, how do i make it so it lets people know there is a server update. on rs it says "server update :59 secs" or something like that. anyone know?

item.title: Update server?
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

thnx both of u :). can someone try to connect to my server real quick? i wanna see if it works.

server:rawrscape.no-ip.biz
port:43594[br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2007, 10:20:48 AM[/size][hr]it won’t let me put my server up on the mopar server list, it says i can only do 1 server on their, does any1 know why? when i tried to put my server on their, i put in the info, clicked submit and it went to an indescribable site.

Read full topic

item.title: Update server?
item.dc:creator: @volarscape volarscape
item.description:
@volarscape wrote:

if you want it like runescape press ::update 120, 120 seconds= 2 mins…

Read full topic

item.title: Update server?
item.dc:creator: @I_Haxor_I I Haxor I
item.description:
@I_Haxor_I wrote:

You need to use the command.

::update -

Instead of the dash put the amount of time.

::update 50

Read full topic
